title: Fired

en: It's finally time, #NAME. I've been waiting for this day for a while.
You see, I don't like bad employees. I especially don't like unfaithful ones.
And finally, you have given me a good reason to do this.

yes_caption: You think I care? I quit!

en: HA! Go ahead and quit! You'll get less money that way. Enjoy your early retirement, 'friend!'
Hmm. That was less satisfying than I thought it would be.
